content.raw:
OMG for real?! The idea crossed my mind, but their deprecation warning was so explicit that I didn't think of looking into a different version: `'send' is deprecated: from 4.3.1, use send taking message_t and send_flags`.

I also explicitly triggered a build of `ign-sensors2` on `windows_nuc` to test if that was the difference and failed [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-2-win/32/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-2-win/32/), but I now realized it wasn't because of the ZMQ issue.

I created a [branch](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/commits/a9f67321b5e87778f7fa1343aedec258c844571a) on `gazebodistro` to use this branch for the sensors CI: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-2-win/33/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-2-win/33/) :fingers_crossed:
content.html:
OMG for real?! The idea crossed my mind, but their deprecation warning was so explicit that I didn't think of looking into a different version: 'send' is deprecated: from 4.3.1, use send taking message_t and send_flags.

I also explicitly triggered a build of ign-sensors2 on windows_nuc to test if that was the difference and failed , but I now realized it wasn't because of the ZMQ issue.

I created a branch on gazebodistro to use this branch for the sensors CI:
